issue.title: [Rust] It should be possible to get a &mut[T] from Builder<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2408](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2408). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I am currently adding Arrow support to the parquet-rs crate and I found a need to get a mutable slice from a Buffer<T> to pass to the parquet column reader methods.
